name: House Design Package
servicePolicy:
1. Post initiation of planning, if plots orientation or facing is changed, client has to pay an extra amount.
  2. Post initiation of planning, if there is any modification in the requirement sheet in terms of adding or subtracting requirements, client has to pay an extra amount.
  3. Post initiation of planning, if plot dimensions are changed, the client has to pay an extra amount.
  4. If a client needs changes in the drawing post approval of that drawing, it will be done with additional payment.
  5. Approximate Built up area shall be informed by the client pre initiation of planning. (in req. sheet)
  6. Post initiation of planning , If Vastu choice is changed , It will be done by additional payment.
  7. Setbacks (area to be let vacant as per Govt. rules)/FAR/FSI shall be informed by the client pre initiation of planning; Masons mark Pvt Ltd shall not be responsible for providing plan as per municipal corporations or the development authority of India. ( in req sheet)
  8. Makemyhouse.com is not responsible for any plan approval from municipal corporations or the development authority of India.
  9. Drawings will be provided as per TAT (Turn Around Time) approved by the client pre initiation of planning.
  10. TAT may be changed in case of any uncertainty from the Technical Department, the same will be informed prior.
  11. Post initiation of Elevation design, if style/theme or concept is changed, client has to pay an extra amount.
  12. Sample of elevation design shall be sent by client or approved by client pre initiation of elevation designing. (MMH team will coordinate for the same)
  13. Color in the design may be slightly varied as shown in electronically generated design and Material available in market.
  14. Material texture may be slightly varied as shown in electronically generated design and Material available in market.
  15. 1st draft of 3D Elevation shall be provided Post approval of Floor Plan.
  16. 1st draft of 2D Elevation shall be provided Post approval of 3D Elevation.
  17. Pre initiation of drawing, client has to prior inform regarding Septic tank availability in their society or colony. (In req sheet)
  18. Pre initiation of drawing, client has to inform regarding capacity of water tank. (In req sheet)
  19. Pre initiation of drawing, client has to inform, if he needs provision of hot water and cold water. (In req sheet)
  20. No AC (Air condition), solar paneling, home automation, Security solutions designs will be provided under given package.
  21. Electrical Looping details are not included in the given package.
  22. Without column and beam details, Electrical and plumbing drawings shall not be initiated.
  23. Structure design shall only be provided against the amount taken for commited no. of floors.
  24. Structure design shall only be provided against the planning done for commited no. of floors.
  25. It is the solely responsibility of client to prior inform about the soil condition of area against which planning/Structural work is received. ( MMH team will coordinate for the same).
  26. Type of Foundation ( Eg: Isometric/Pile etc ) shall be prior discussed with Structural Engineer of makemyhouse. ( MMH team will coordinate for the same)
  27. Load bearing structure will not be provided by makemyhouse by any hook or force.
  28. In case of renovation, If existing building is built on Load bearing structure, Makemyhouse shall not responsible for Providing any further Structure drawing on the same.
  29. Number of columns and beam grids shall only be decided or approved by our structural engineer as per technical feasibility.
  30. In case of any changes on site is done without prior information or approval by Makemyhouse Technical Team. Makemyhouse shall not be responsible for any damage or loss incurred by the client.
  31. 3D floor plan is a 3D representation of floor planning, 3D Render image will be shown till lintel level height.
  32. 2D Floor plan is pre requisite to execute 3D floor plan.
  33. No changes in space planning will be done in this service.
  34. Changes related to finishes like floor texture, fabric & wall colors etc shall only be entertained.
  35. 3D floor plan shall only be provided for the per floor amount received.

addons.name: 3D Floor Plan

addons.servicePolicy:
1. 3D floor plan is a 3D representation of floor planning, 3D Render image will be shown till lintel level height.
  2. 2D Floor plan is pre requisite to execute 3D floor plan.
  3. No changes in space planning will be done in this service.
  4. Changes related to finishes like floor texture, fabric & wall colors etc shall only be entertained.
  5. 3D floor plan shall only be provided for the per floor amount received.

addons.name: Coloured Layout Plan

  3. No changes in space planning will be done in this service.
  4. Changes related to finishes like floor texture, landscape design & furniture color shall only be entertained.

name: Working Drawings
description: Dimension Plan, Section Drawing, Toilet Standard Detail\'s, Kitchen Standard Detail\'s, Door\'s & Window\'s Detail's, Electrical Layout
servicePolicy:
1. Pre initiation of drawing, client has to prior inform regarding Septic tank availability in their society or colony. ( in req sheet)
  2. Pre initiation of drawing, client has to inform regarding capacity of water tank.( in req sheet).
  3. Pre initiation of drawing, client has to inform, If he needs provision of hot water and cold water. ( in req sheet).
  4. No AC( Air condition) , solar paneling, Home automation, Security solutions designs will be provided under given package.
  5. Electrical Looping details are not included in the given package.
  6. Without column and beam details, Electrical and plumbing drawings shall not be initiated.
features: Concept Kitchen And Toilet details with legend for knowledge
Electrical: Includes electrical layout of each and every room with switch board, light, fan etc positions.

name: Structure Drawing
description: We provide Frame RCC structure design using IS code for respective zone and soil type
servicePolicy:
1. Structure design shall only be provided against the amount taken for commited no. of floors.
  2. Structure design shall only be provided against the planning done for commited no. of floors.
  3. It is the solely responsibility of client to prior inform about the soil condition of area against which planning/Structural work is received. ( MMH team will coordinate for the same).
  4. Type of Foundation ( Eg: Isometric/Pile etc ) shall be prior discussed with Structural Engineer of makemyhouse. ( MMH team will coordinate for the same)
  5. Load bearing structure will not be provided by makemyhouse by any hook or force.
  6. In case of renovation, If existing building is built on Load bearing structure, Makemyhouse shall not responsible for Providing any further Structure drawing on the same.
  7. Number of columns and beam grids shall only be decided or approved by our structural engineer as per technical feasibility.
  8. In case of any changes on site is done without prior information or approval by Makemyhouse Technical Team. Makemyhouse shall not be responsible for any damage or loss incurred by the client.

addons.name: BBS drawings
addons.description: With the help of bar bending schedule the requirement of different length and sizes of bars may be known and can be arranged and bent-up during the time of construction
addons.servicePolicy:
1. Bar bending schedule will be provided as per structure SET 1 and SET 2.
  2. New amount for BBS is required if structure designs will be changed after BBS.
features: Cutting Length along with segregated Diameter wise Iron Bars complete details
Foundation detail and Footing plan (as per site condition if soil report is received)
Lintel Details as per intermediate space
Slab Design and its reinforcement detail
Beam Design and its reinforcement details as per drawings
Staircase Design and its sections if required

name: Plumbing/Drainage
description: Waster water and drain water supply of Building with water tank and septic tank capacity as per need
servicePolicy:
1. Pre initiation of drawing, client has to prior inform regarding Septic tank availability in their society or colony. (In req sheet)
  2. Pre initiation of drawing, client has to inform regarding capacity of water tank. (In req sheet)
  3. Pre initiation of drawing, client has to inform, if he needs provision of hot water and cold water. (In req sheet)
  4. No AC (Air condition), solar paneling, home automation, Security solutions designs will be provided under given package.
  5. Electrical Looping details are not included in the given package.
  6. Without column and beam details, Electrical and plumbing drawings shall not be initiated.
features: Drainage: Includes placement of chambers, waste pipes etc from toilets till outlet and Septic Tank Details (if required)
Plumbing: Includes all pipe line layout from Tank to all faucets & taps
Rain Water and Drain Water Management if required

name: BOQ for loan approval
description: Rough Bill of quantity is provided for LOAN PURPOSE ONLY, carries approx rates of materials (Excludes detail bifurcation of same material like steel diameter )
servicePolicy:
1. BOQ shall be designed as per PWD SOR (Schedule of Rates).
  2. Rates mentioned in BOQ may vary in actual. a. as per material availability and site conditions. b. as per geographical region. c. As per Soil condition.
features: Total Construction Cost as per given designs• Complete Material detail along with Quantity
Detailed Labor Cost including civil and other jobs

name: Material Quantity
description: Material Quantity includes basic calculation civil materials used in building ,make purchasing easy to individual customer (Excludes detail bifurcation of same material like steel diameter )
servicePolicy: 1. Material quantities are on approximate calculations and may vary as per local geographic and market conditions.

name: BOQ as per SOR/PWD
description: Detailed Bill of quantities are provided as per region and location of client (Excludes detail bifurcation of same material like steel diameter )
servicePolicy:
1. BOQ shall be designed as per PWD SOR (Schedule of Rates).
  2. Rates mentioned in BOQ may vary in actual. a. as per material availability and site conditions. b. as per geographical region. c. As per Soil condition.
features: Total cost along with material details and labor details as per Schedule of rates of Particular State

name: Rough Estimate
description: Rough estimate given by company on lettter head with area and cost per sq ft with client name and address
servicePolicy: 1. It is only rough Lump-Sum cost per square feet. No material or any other details will be provided.
features: Lump-Sum Cost of the building Per Square Feet as per available built-up area
